and two are listed .', 'During the conversion they changed both , their function and architectural form , but the visual effect in every case differed from good to not satisfactory .', 'That was because the final result of such action depended not only on the talent and knowledge of the architect , but also on the level of sensitivity and collaboration between the other 4 actor which took part in those change : the owner ; the local authority ; the conservationist ; and the local society .', "In conclusion , `` continuity by change '' in Modern Movement heritage may give a wonderful opportunity for architecture and for cultural heritage .", 'However , it demands much effort from all people in charge , including the developer and the local society .', 'Yet , it is the only proper way to avoid the still frequent fate of many valuable building of modern legacy-negligence and disruption .', 'Architecture and urban planning in “ Magamat-I-Hamidi ” ( sixth century Lunar calendar ) .', 'Magamat-I-Hamidi , the book of the judge Hamid al-din Balkhi , is one of the great literary work that is writed to delight Persian community , as the Author approved in the introduction .', 'Since using the community material and spiritual culture is one of required tool to achieve this goal , so this book is also rich in tradition , architecture and urban planning , and reflects the true face of the culture in author ’ s time period and the culture of upper strata of the society and the specific custom of other nation .', 'The art of Architecture is one of the most conspicuous emanation of people culture during every period of history , indicates human life environment and also consistently and irrefrangiblely linked with society culture and behavioral pattern .', 'This is the reason to why the architectural style of any period of time is a reflection of the culture and the art of that time .', 'This paper attempts to survey all appearance and emanation of popular culture in the field of architecture and urban planning in this literary work .', "Housing , architecture and urban planning `` Aufi 's Jawāmi ul-Hikāyāt wa Lawāmi ' ul-Riwāyāt '' ( 6 th -7 th century AH ) .", 'Sadiduddin Aufi is one of the scientist of the late sixth and early seventh century AH whose most important work is Jawāmi ul-Hikāyāt .', 'This book is his most important work and the most important book written in Persian which consists of historical and literary benefit that can not be found elsewhere .', 'In this book , all issue related to the history of civilization , literature , ethic , and science of Islamic world have been discussed through 2113 anecdote .', "The art of architecture is the clearest manifestation of the culture of the people in Aufi 's Jawāmi ul-Hikāyāt .", 'Reviewing architectural work of Jawāmi ul-Hikāyāt , it could be feasible to find out the direct and profound relationship between the ideology and attitude of the people to the existence in the 6 th and 7 th era , his beliefs , generally what is called culture and whatever is exposed as the architectural work .', "In this sense human 's attitude and interpretation of the existence has influenced in shaping the architecture .", 'Exploring the historical and literary book gives us some information on architecture , housing , and urban planning .', "One of these literary work is Jawāmi ul-Hikāyāt wa Lawāmi ' ul-Riwāyāt of Muḥammad Aufi which is a rich and valuable treasure trove of the history and civilization and culture of Iranian nation by which the current generation will be acquainted with the kind of life and experience of the past and can link the past to the new era .", "In this paper it has been tried to provide a clearer image by checking the architecture and urban planning of Aufi 's age .", 'Non-erasable human trace against urban transformation [ Kentsel yenilemeye karşın silinemeyen insan izleri ] .', "The notion of urban transformation , which occupies Turkey 's agenda , has gained much more momentum because of new urban planning regulation .", "The regulation aim to make some part of the city more 'flawless ' , affecting the physical character and societal norm of the city .", 'The city of Istanbul , which is attempting to create this flawless look by clarification of timeworn urban part with the help of urban transformation project , is evaluated as a revenue generator ; giving Istanbul the opportunity to advance its economy to the level of other global brand city .', 'Istanbul , a capital city with many different civilization since the Roman Empire , is such a glowing city in term of its economical characteristic .', 'The city developed during century by many overlapping layer of cultural code and living space belonging to many different culture .', 'Preserving its history has an important value with this kind of cultural diversity and richness .', 'As it is well known , inaccurate political decision , intended to gain more vote , caused a significant amount of land to be informally occupied by immigrant who then constructed building lacking quality .', 'The 1999 earthquake in the city created a need to rehabilitate these informally built area and accelerated the movement of urban transformation project of the timeworn and bedraggled area on the uppermost layer of the city .', 'But these effort turned into a total change of the city instead of preserving the tradition and history of Istanbul .', 'By the expropriation law in 2006 , Romans who were living in Sulukule since the 11th century were forced to abandon their home .', 'The Roman house , which could not be improved because of the lack of education and unemployment of the people living in the area , were demolished and no trace was left of its history .', 'The new building built in the area in the present time , appeal to a very high income group and the project only focuses to create private space for new home owner excluding any kind of urban space for the rest of the public .', 'Although the project is planned with social function for the Sulukule people , it is clear that those people will not be able to live in the area since the land value has increased ten-fold .', "Three different case against the project , causing it to be canceled because no 'public benefit ' could be found , have created recognition for the issue .", 'The kind of urban transformation movement which does not allow cultural value to be transferred to the present time is such an erasing activity-scratching out not only the physical reality but also a way of living .', 'The people of Sulukule who were located to the house built by the government at the outskirt of Istanbul , came back and moved in to the neighborhood close to their old living area to pursue their usual daily life activity since there has been no increase in their income .', 'They could not adapt to apartment living , reimburse their rent , monthly revenue and transportation expense .', 'Consequently , it can not be told that such an urban transformation implementation has achieved its goal .', 'While urban deprivation is the main problematic issue of urban transformation , the implementation , on the other hand , is only setting back this deprivation sweeping it to the edge .', 'So , the erasing activity of the dozer was not able to neither destroy nor cause social practice to disappear , but only caused them to be set back slightly .', 'In the scope of this paper , Sulukule city part , which will be evaluated as a palimpsest urban space , is clarified from its flaw but many life story engraved into the history that are assumed to be erased , are still leaking into the present time of ours beneath from the parchment paper .', 'That form of leakage will be tried to be transferred to the reader by the help of observation and interview made by the researcher in the area .', 'In the scope of this article , the issue of social transformation will tried to be argued upon an implemented urban transformation project in such a way that as long as urban transformation policy do not make a contribution to rehabilitate the problem of education , health and unemployment , they will unfortunately continue to be such phenomenon increasing the unearned income in the city .', 'An urban healing agenda for reform in Bahrain : Where the dweller falls into the urban gap and the sailing boat hits the skyscraper .', 'The change of the Arabian Gulf city due to the sudden development in wealth after the unearthing of oil has been a subject of curiosity and concern for many year .', "This paper is based on a completed master 's study which investigated the effect of the discovery of oil on the urban identity of Bahrain , by examining the relationship between the old and the new in the urban fabric .", 'The thrust of the study further focused on exploring the role of two governmental institution , the Ministry of Culture and the University of Bahrain , in stimulating this change .', 'Using a qualitative research approach , the study employed a number of different source of data .', 'The first group , including archival resource , journal and newspaper article , in addition to the diary and writing of Englishmen , especially those of the British advisor Sir Charles Belgrave , aimed at investigating the change in the urban fabric of Bahrain since the discovery of oil .', 'The second group , including questionnaire and interview , aimed at examining the consequence of this change in the work of the two governmental institution today .', 'The study provides a description of the change in the urban identity of Bahrain , and an understanding of how the effect of this change in shaping the lifestyle and ideology of people living on the island today .', 'Some limitation in the practice of the two institution are highlighted , and recommendation for both the Ministry of Culture and the University of Bahrain are proposed .', 'The imagination of architecture : Analogy and difference between orient and west .', 'The symbolic meaning of the city shape is recognizable in the complexity of its architecture .', 'The paper discussed the architectural difference between orient and west .', 'Furthermore , Feng-shui was deeply discussed to identify that the beauty in architecture shows a variety of style in both orient and west .', 'The following conclusion are drawn : an approach that strengthens the relationship among people , social organization , and architecture object , it needs to aim at the safeguard of environment as limited resource .', 'This process can derive only from comparison and exchange among different culture .', 'How to keep the image of the traditional block - Analysis of the strategy of renewal in china by comparing with the similar case in Australia .', 'By comparing the two different commercial pedestrian street ( the Queen Street Mall , Brisbane , Australia and the FuRong Street , JiNan , China ) in three concept : Tradition , Energy , Operation .', 'Thinking over the protection and inheritance of traditional urban scene and characteristic of regional space during the reconstruction of traditional block .', "China 's urbanization process has been more than thirty year since the eighty of last century , modern city begin to form .", "During these vicissitude , people fully experience the convenience and fast in modern city , however , they often cherish the warm and cozy of strolling in the lane , it is the regional space survived in the city updates usually that represents a city 's culture and history as sign .", "However , this `` sign '' fade away generally with the urban renewal and shantytown renovation , resulting in the characteristic of the city dissolved , the urban style have been assimilated increasingly .", 'Because of researching collaboratively with the HRP , an Australian architecture and urban design group , we have visited Brisbane , the capital of Queensland .', 'The Queen Street which is located in the central area of CBD have given us a deep impression .', 'Comparing with the FuRong Street in Jinan , the latter has more advantage in position , function , and historical background .', 'Thus it inspired our keen interest .', 'This paper will discuss the gain and loss in design and construction of traditional block by analysis and comparison .', 'Cadastral application of satellite image with high spatial resolution in Easter Island ( Chile ) .', "The purpose of this project is to demonstrate the potentiality of satellite image with high spatial resolution ( QuickBridII ) and GPS system for cadastral application in a zone so particular in landuse administration like Rapa Nui or Easter Island , located in the middle of the Pacific Ocean , lat 27° 07 ' long 109° 22 ' in front to the Chilean coast .", 'Additionally , the last cartographic information , made with GPS measurement , was indispensable in the actualization and study of important change in different point of the island , providing precise measurement in georeference for the landuse map of the city and geometric control point to the correction processing of the satellite image .', "Created this cartographic data base support in the satellite image processing we can mixed this information with the cartographic mosaic , all this to know the reality of the state 's property and its future transference to the ancient owner of the island .", "However , the potential of this work was the way to study the landuse change in Rapa Nui , using satellite tool and new technique in the island to improve the urban growing planning and so he condition of people 's life , but knowing too its impact according with that urban planning and considering the course of historical error about this topic .", "So this project gives an actual situation in the cadastral file used in the island associated with a cartographic data base for the Ministry in charge , being very important to show the application in urban planning using geomatics technology , in relation too with to choose the best alternative to be used in this particular area , showing an atypical situation for its different culture in reference to belong and landuse possession , specifically ; and in other aspect , this job pretend to get a good level of security in order to future inversion in urban infrastructure and improvement of quality life in the moai 's ( megalithic sculpture ) land .", 'Effect of combined upgrading and new development scheme on housing pattern of the site .', 'Case study of ismailia project in Egypt .', 'Ismailia project is considered as one of the pioneer experiment in the field of Housing Locally , while it has already obtained three International award for its approach and performance .', "The project consists of several site to be upgraded and developed , the most famous one is 'Hai-Elsalam ' that located on the northern edge of Ismailia city itself and served about 40,000 person in the upgraded part of the project and similar number of people in the new development part .", 'The effect of the project approach that combined upgrading component to the new development scheme on both the original pattern of Housing and the new one is the subject of this paper .', 'The transformation output would be looked at as a result of various factor including : The transformation in Housing provision mechanism , Deviation in original target population , and the real interaction between the project theory and the local community condition and culture .', 'In this respect both the user characteristic as well as their built environment would be considered in the analysis process in relation to activity and culture of occupant .', 'The study aims at recording , analyzing , and using the output of the project as it represents with a series of other study an important feedback of this pioneer experiment .']

['Social impact assessment and public participation in China : A case study of land requisition in Guangzhou .', "This study examines the current prospect for and obstacle facing the implementation of social impact assessment ( SIA ) and participatory planning in the People 's Republic of China .", 'During the past two decade , rapid urbanisation and the conversion of rural land for urban development have led to numerous social conflict and tension between the Chinese government and its people .', 'SIA and public participation in development decision have received increasing attention from the Chinese authority as possible way to tackle the problem .', 'Based on a Guangzhou case study , this paper argues that the assessment and mitigation of adverse impact on the community from urban development have been carried out with different objective , core value and principle when compared with those in Western society .', 'It concludes that the poor prospect of SIA and collaborative planning in China lie not only in the weak framework for environmental legislation , but also in all institution concerning state-society relation , the socialist governing ideology and traditional Chinese culture .', 'The middle class in neoliberal China : Governing risk , life-building , and themed space .', "Since the late 1970s , China 's move towards neoliberalism has made it not only one of the world 's fastest growing economy , but also one of the most polarised state .", 'This economic , social and political transformation has led to the emergence of a new Chinese middle class , and understanding the development and the role of this new social group is crucial to understanding contemporary Chinese society .', 'Investigating the new politics of the middle class in China , this book addresses three major question .', 'First , how does the Chinese state deal with problem of national sovereignty and political representation to create the middle class both as a legitimate category of the people and as an ideal norm of citizenship ?', 'Second , how does the recognition of the middle class norm take place in the practice of everyday life ?', 'Finally , what kind of risk does the politics of the middle class generate not only for middle class subject but also for the disenfranchised ?', 'In answering these question , this book examines a set of practice , body of knowledge , measure , and institution that aim to manage , govern , control , and orient the behaviour , gesture , and thought of Chinese citizen .', 'This investigation contributes not only to the understanding of the Chinese middle class society but also to the scholarly debate over the relationship between governmental apparatus , subjectification , and life-building .', 'Drawing on ethnographic information , historical archive , and the medium , this book will be of great interest to student and scholar working in the field of Chinese study , Chinese politics , ethnic study and urban study , as well as those interested in culture , society , class and welfare .', "'China 's leading historical and cultural city ' : Branding Dali City through public-private partnership in Bai architecture revitalization .", 'Competing with other Chinese city for investment and tourism , various governmental body with jurisdiction in Dali City have begun to make use of local historical and cultural asset in order to brand the city .', 'This paper aims to reveal how partnership between the public and private sector in heritage management have functioned as an approach to city branding , and how local people perceive and are influenced by these partnership .', "Applying perspective from the scholarly literature on city branding and public-private partnership , this paper examines two case in Dali City - Zhang 's Garden and the Linden Center - to detail how local government and elite entrepreneur have partnernered in support of Bai architecture revitalization with tourism in mind .", 'This paper also considers opinion from the local general public regarding these partnership , and investigates the complex relationship among local government , elite entrepreneur , and the public .', 'Traditional architectural form in market oriented Chinese city : Place for locality or symbol of culture ?', '.', 'China provides a unique social-economic and political context for urban conservation and regeneration within the current trend of modernisation and globalisation .', 'This paper investigates 4 urban regeneration project conducted in four most internationalised historical Chinese city from 1989 to 2005 , in order to understand how traditional architectural element are manipulated in these project .', 'It also examines the role local government , developer , designer and local resident played in these project in the intensification process of the market oriented economy over time .', 'The paper argues that socio-cultural sustainable regeneration of historical urban environment must make place for local people , rather than preserve certain traditional form as cultural symbol .', 'Tradition must evolve by the collective and traditional form must be widely used in architectural and urban design with community involvement , in order to achieve real cultural identity and social cohesion .', 'Soviet influence on urban planning in Beijing , 1949-1991 .', "Urban planning in the People 's Republic of China ( PRC ) has rarely been researched and documented .", 'In this paper , the author uses first hand information to chart the development and actual implementation of urban planning in the PRC using the national capital , Beijing , as an example .', 'The study finds that the concept , standard and method used in the USSR had greatly influenced urban planning in Beijing between 1949 and 1991 .', 'However , there were also locally derived influence involved - Confucianism and Maoism .', 'After 1978 , market force as well as contemporary Western planning idea and methodology started to have an effect on the planning of Beijing .', 'Urban planning is perceived therefore as the combined outcome of culture , politics and economic development .', 'Key indicator for the resilience of complex urban public space .', 'Qualified with the function of matter , culture , spirit , economy , and history , urban public space is a thorough introduction to the principle of urban design theory and mirror the characteristic of urban society .', "Over the last couple of decade , urban area in China context have been engaged in increasing initiative and practice with view to facilitate people 's life and intensively utilize land resource .", 'Echoing with these , the complex urban public space ( CUPSs ) with multi-layer structure integrated in three-dimensional space have been constructed in many city , such as the integrated railway transport hub , airport terminal , and commercial complex .', "The CUPSs facilitate people 's traffic transfer and satisfy people 's multi-commercial function requirement .", 'However , the CUPSs are also subject to many kind of risk event due to complex structure , crowded people in each layer and openness .', 'Resilience is a kind of ability to resist risk , absorb the damage of risk event , and recover to normal operation situation , which presents high importance for the risk reduction .', 'Gaining resilience and enhancing risk resistance ability of CUPSs are indispensable but indeed difficult as it is determined by lot of influencing indicator .', 'In response , this paper intends to conduct a research on the exploration of key indicator for the resilience of CUPSs .', 'Content analysis , expert investigation , and Analytic Hierarchy Process ( AHP ) will be adopted for the identification , analysis , and contribution evaluation of the key indicator .', 'Prospectively , the key indicator in a sound taxonomy to break down the resilience will be obtained .', 'The main finding of this research could provide useful reference for governor and policy maker to enhance the resilience of CUPSs .', 'Geo-architecture and landscape in China ’ s geographic and historic context : Volume 4 symbolism and the language of geo-architecture .', 'This book approaches the concept of geo-architecture by analyzing the symbolic character of architecture .', 'It proves that the relationship between architecture and geography is not merely an embodiment of physical and functional demand but rather a formal expression of the materialization of culture .', 'After analyzing the vast number of village , group of building and individual building the form of which closely resemble the form of the Bagua ( symbol of the Eight Trigrams ) , Taichi , animal and plant , this book finds that this kind of symbolism creatively places living and working place within the natural geographic environment and , by seeking a relationship between architecture and its surrounding environment , comes to express people ’ s hope and dream , evolving slowly to take on certain cultural connotation .', 'This book is the fourth of a 4-volume book series .', 'The series develops the innovative concept of “ geo-architecture ” by exploring the myriad influence of natural , human and historical factor upon architecture .', 'These influence are considered in three category , namely , interaction between architecture and nature , interaction between architecture and its human user and change in architecture over time -- each category serves as a lens .', 'Augmenting these lens is the Time-Person-Place concept applied different geographic .', 'The analysis ultimately focuses on two aspect : geographic influence on architecture and architectural response to geography .', 'The over 1000 picture of case architecture enriches the study with stunning and unique visual angle .', '`` This unprecedented work will be a unique and valuable contribution to the literature .', 'Integrating as it does the discipline of architecture , landscape architecture , and geography , Wang Fang ’ s voice is original , compelling , and will be much appreciated by English-speaking reader ( and inside China , too , I can only imagine . )', "'' Stephen M Ervin Assistant Dean Graduate School of Design , Harvard University July 2nd , 2013 `` One reason for why there would be interest is because her research would fill some significant gap in the literature.What is novel about Dr. Wang ’ s series is that she further extends this intellectual project of looking at Chinese architecture through Chinese eye , by taking it one provocative step further .", '`` Annette M. Kim Associate Professor Department of Urban Studies and Planning , M.I.T .', 'July 1st , 2013 .', 'From the First Five-Year Plan to the Cultural Revolution : the pre-reform urban transformation of Hangzhou , China .', "Pre-reform Chinese city base their uniqueness in urban transformation on Mao 's duality of utopian and revolutionary ideal and pragmatic and economized approach in practice .", "Through the lens of urban economy , population management , and city planning , this paper examines China 's pre-reform urban transformation .", "By the case study of Hangzhou , this research reveals that urban development was driven by a diverse set of force devised by the communist state to configure the urban condition and control people 's daily life in pursuit of radical socialist goal .", 'The control from the state and other pertinent force led to the actual outcome of political-economic ambition and spatial policy rhetoric .', "It was an inherent feature of the society and economy to go outside of the state 's control , and the unintended consequence were unavoidable .", 'The state had to revise their strategy , the outcome of which were again to be tested by time .', 'An iterative process determined the urban transformation of Chinese city .', 'The study of urban history in the People ’ s Republic of China .', 'Since the establishment of the People ’ s Republic of China in 1949 , most of the topic associated with the study of urban history have languished largely unstudied beneath a pall of ideologically based neglect .', 'The list of understudied subject includes urban population , physical structure , social structure , economic activity , urban politics , urban planning and the environment , and urban culture .', 'This lack of interest in urban history directly reflects the emphasis on the role of the peasantry as a creative force in Chinese history .', 'The history of Chinese peasant uprising and war became the focus of attention and left little interest for what change might have taken place in urban setting .', 'Today , a combination of force has generated considerable change in the institutional structure of historical study in China , as well as compelling historian to reconsider established research preference .', 'In this atmosphere it appears that for the first time since 1949 topic that concern urban historian in the West and Japan are receiving serious attention in the People ’ s Republic of China .', 'While it is still too early to speak of urban history in China , continuation of current trend in historical research over the next five to ten year will almost certainly bring this specialization into existence .', 'Landscape Parks in China : Steering and Handling Growing Tourism .', 'Chinese way of organizing and exploiting landscape park area , particularly those of historical importance are specific , due to the contemporary overexploitation of these site .', 'Historic landscape Park of Quin Shi Huang , contains the world-famous “ Terracotta Army ” .', 'Such a tourist attraction demands organization of access and traffic on an archaeological site and throughout the immense landscape park .', 'The administration of Panjin Park in the Liaoning Province acts to extend the tourist season beyond August/September , when Suaeda Salsa is in bloom and the “ Red Beach ” attracts million of visitor .', 'The idea of spreading tourist goal beyond icon of nature and history and directing them towards rural culture are the most challenging .', 'Eco-farmsteads with animal and traditional crop from orchard , vegetable plot and field are viewed as an attraction by people who never experienced village life .', 'Research method employed in the paper include on-site visit , review of literature , conference paper and related PhD dissertation .', 'Rural Design Ethics Based on Four Dimensions .', 'China has a large rural area with a large population , whose architectural feature , natural landscape , organizational structure and industrial structure are very different from that of city .', 'In the past , the contradictory between city and rural area in China had negative effect on rural construction , resulting in a slow development .', 'The excessive focus on city design has led to the neglect of rural design .', 'Blindly using the concept and method of city design to renewed the countryside is a kind of destruction to the countryside , and also wastes a lot of construction resource .', 'Design is influenced by ethical concept , which needs to pay more attention to the culture tendency and society .', 'Urban design makes theoretical investigation aiming at the ethical question that emerged from city , then summarizes the design strategy of the city .', "While Chinese rural design has only begun to enter people 's horizon , and there is very little discussion about it .", 'Due to the lack of ethical value guidance , Chinese rural design and construction has many problem at different level of ecology , culture and industry .', 'Therefore this paper primarily explores the domestic and foreign design ethic , attempting to provide a new perspective for Chinese rural design , aiming at finding a realistic and forward-looking solution for Chinese rural design concerning to the complex relation between city and rural area .', 'Analysis of new urban planning based on green ecological economics .', 'With the development of social economy , the urbanization of the world has presented a new development trend .', "The green , ecological , and economic city has gradually attracted people 's attention .", 'How to plan new city and town to coordinate economic development with nature has been the focus of domestic and foreign scholar .', 'Based on this premise , this article elaborates the domestic and foreign research status of ecological city and puts forward a new type of green ecological civilization from the perspective of evolution of civilization .', "From the perspective of green ecological economy , the evolution of China 's urban planning is studied in term of the urban and rural area , nature , pollution , industry , culture , and other aspect .", 'To accumulate experience , green ecological planning in New York is also analyzed at multiple level , such as urban expansion , energy , and urban water use .', "According to the development of our country in the past 30 year , the development strategy of urbanization suitable to China 's national condition is introduced on the basis of ecological economy .", "From the perspective of green ecological planning and economy , practice has proved that new urban planning is able to promote the establishment of a resource-saving society , to enhance the coordinated development of the population , resource , environment , and economy , and to comprehensively improve people 's quality of life .", 'Low-carbon space in urban and rural area : Ecological greenway planning of Shanhaiguan district , Qinhuangdao city , China .', 'With the rapid development of urbanization , more intensive urban building and crowded space resulted in the declining of the environmental quality in urban area , and also eroding the natural and cultural resource both in urban and rural area , which requested the desire for healthy living and natural environment .', "Greenway , with the low-carbon to meet people 's desire , is a dedicated `` way '' linking the urban , natural and cultural landscape .", 'With ecological protection , exercise , recreation and leisure , historical and cultural continuity , and other function , it is one of the special low-carbon space .', 'Greenway , sharing and integration of urban and rural resource , plays the role of effective protection of urban and rural local cultural and ecological environment .', 'The design of the Shanhaiguan Greenway , for example , is not only to meet the basic requirement of the greenway , but also combined with the history and culture , to further Improve the urban quality of the historical and cultural city of Shanhaiguan and build an urban and rural low-carbon space .', 'Enhancing the image of urban space , promoting urban history and culture : A case study of the urban design of wangjiang avenue .', "As regarded as people 's main activity space in the city , urban road are the most important part of city ' public space environment and they are also the main way to observe and understand the city .", "So the urban design of city ' road is no doubt the most straightforward and effective method to display and enhance the city ' image .", "Along with the improvement of people 's living standard , people 's requirement of the charm and quality of city ' public space environment are becoming higher and higher .", "This paper takes the urban design of Wangjiang Avenue as an example to do some useful exploration on enhancing city ' space image .", 'The study on the re-constructing poor spot in Beijing .', "As a modern and international urban , the capital city of China , Beijing 's developing has been seen by all over the world .", "Now the city 's developing direction has been denied in the core aspect like residential , political , and culture by the central government , rather than the economic only in the traditional way .", "This paper is focusing on the research of the development of real estate in Beijing from 1990s , especially the area of less developing area , which are the main obstacle of Beijing city 's developing during the 11th five-year-planning .", 'Using the questionnaire and GIS & RS spatial analysis method , we investigated more than 200 spot in the central city , the 8 district of Beijing , to collect the field information of these area .', "In most of these area , there live the local people more than 100 year who are mostly the poor , it is the main task of harmony society 's to resolve these person 's living condition for improving their welfare .", 'Following the new city planning instituted in 2005 by local government , we proposed several suggestion for these less developing area , i.e .', 'protecting the historical culture , mining the potential value , building new house for them in the suburban , etc .', 'and there must be other matched politics for reach these purpose .', 'Public open space as unifying aspect of society : San Francisco City case .', 'In the context of society , the aspect of social , culture economy , politic , are bound together and have a crucial role .', 'Those aspect are the important factor on regional planning consideration , including in term of architectural such as urban space organization , building orientation , public open space availability , impact activity , routine , and behaviour that exist within the society .', 'By the existence of public open space , the people within the city will have bigger chance to fulfill their social need .', 'The development of public open space which based on the social need and city instrument oriented will help to raise the effectiveness of society routine .', 'The relation between public open space and city instrument are impacting one another , along with the environment .', "San Francisco has an attractive amount of public open space , which has regularity and space 's harmony to affect social life of citizen .", 'This paper investigates paradigm of public open space as unifying aspect of society in develop quality of life .', 'With present paper we aim to increase the awareness of public open space in urban planning and design .', 'Analyzing correlation of urban functionality and spatial configuration .', 'As the urban development continues , different part of a city can grow or decay by varying degree due to natural deterioration or change in governmental policy .', 'City is the center for business , culture , and social activity ; is the place that reflects geography , commerce , society , and culture context ; is a complex whole that is woven by “ people , ” “ activity , ” and “ space ” “ People ” in the “ space ” can process “ activity , ” therefore , activity and space can influence each other .', 'In this research , we aim to obtain insight on urban morphology by analyzing the change in urban space ’ “ activity ” pattern .', 'We aim to explore the relationship between urban spatial configuration and functionality .', 'Space syntax methodology is applied to investigate the urban spatial structure concurrently with the analytic hierarchy process method for evaluating expert ’ survey responses to attain urban functionality index .', 'Subsequently , the analytical data are compared and categorized to reveal the city district ’ spatial characteristic and their correlation .', 'This research has proven that the analysis finding are consistent with the actual urban condition , and thus affirms our analytical framework of having a creditable comprehension of the advantage and disadvantage of urban spatial integration and its functionality .', 'Therefore , our research methodology can be applied as an efficient preliminary evaluation tool for conceiving the merit of city district .', 'Based on the finding of our research , authority will be able to discuss the urban development agenda in greater detail with higher efficiency .', 'The Impact of Ancient Landscape Changes on the City Arrangement of the Early Shang Dynasty Capital Zhengzhou , Central China .', 'Buried underneath modern Zhengzhou city in Henan Province , China , lies the archeological remains of one of the ancient capital city of the Shang dynasty ( 1766 – 1122 BCE ) .', 'Although it is likely that people planned this Shang capital city according to the demand of the surrounding environment , there is no clear relationship between the current environment , such as the hydrology and topography , and the ancient city ’ s layout .', 'To better understand the relationship between planning principle used during the Shang dynasty and the nearby environment at Zhengzhou , we measured and sampled stratigraphic exposure at excavation location throughout Zhengzhou .', 'Through these excavation we obtained both absolute and relative chronological data from each culture layer , enabling us to use geospatial interpolation and analysis method to reconstruct the ancient landscape .', 'The result show that ancient city ’ s different activity area had a close relationship with their environmental context .', 'For example , the Shang dynasty palace was located on high ground and workshop were located down below along the course of ancient river .', 'In conclusion , we argue that research that merges geomorphology and archeology is a necessary prerequisite for understanding the development of urban area .', 'Discussion about the cultural inheritance and protection measure optimization in Qijiang ancient town .', 'The call for cultural heritage protection has been more and more urgent since Mr. Liang took the research of Beijing until the 1980s town protection work in the national general expansion .', 'Cultural change , cultural transition , cultural loss phenomenon often occur , so the inheritance of traditional culture is particularly important .', 'We set Qijiang town in Sichuan province as the research object about the outstanding traditional culture and traditional cultural activity .', 'Thinking about the current situation of the traditional culture protection , paying attention to the truth and the traditional cultural carrier and getting help from all people , we can get optimization method about traditional culture protection measure .', 'Discussion on protection and renovation of Minority nationality characteristic dwelling in the southwest of Hubei Province .', 'Traditional architecture is a representative culture symbol of a region or a nation , which is not only the representative of material culture and the carrier of non-material culture , but also a typical cultural space .', 'Minority nationality characteristic dwelling is a miracle of Chinese traditional folk residence .', 'Under the impact of globalization and modernization , traditional residential architecture has been greatly affected and destroyed .', 'At present , protection and reform on the Minority nationality characteristic dwelling in the southwest of Hubei Province has been paid attention by all the people .', 'In this process , great achievement have been made , while many problem have appeared .', 'This paper analyzes the social value , economic value and ecological value of Minority nationality characteristic dwelling protection , and the current problem of protection .', 'It starts from the reality of minority nationality characteristic dwelling protection and analyzes the different region , ethnic , social , and economic ecological condition .', 'It has put forward the protection principle and method to promote protection and renovation work of dwelling in southwest minority area for further expand and upgrade .', 'Research on the development of urban space axis in China .', 'The development of urban space axis is a historical process .', 'People in different region , with different culture have different understanding of urban space axis .', "However , in the background of world 's economic and cultural integration , urban planner , architect , government and builder miss in the issue of how to construct the urban space axis .", 'The destruction of traditional urban axis and the convergence of new urban space axis exist at the same time .', 'Then , where the development of urban space axis will go ?', 'It is just the subject to discuss for planner and architect .', 'Simple discussion on creating a historical and cultural concept on city square design - Exemplified by hundred mile of the Yellow River in Lanzhou .', 'City square , as a major public urban space .', 'By a sense of spiritual civilization , it should be a window of the city and essential building space to daily life of local resident ; it also bears an important heritage city in cultural context responsibility .', 'Based on the Yellow River in Lanzhou City , Barry style line design concept of the study , analyzed and summarized , presented the concept of square design to create a historical and cultural context of urban culture , the importance of heritage and modern artistic expression should be on urban history and culture diversity to interpretation , to make people re-establish the cultural identity for the city to gain ownership of the spirit .', 'The exploring for the concept of history and culture on city square design-exampled by Lanzhou city .', 'For thousand of year , Lanzhou city has long history and bright culture , and has numerous historic building and cultural relic .', 'But with the rapid development of the city , many cultural heritage had been destroyed .', 'The city appearance are becoming more and more similar , urban culture root has not clear , the city began to become unfamiliar .', 'The reason is the local resident have a lack of cultural identity to living environment .', 'City square , as a major public urban space .', 'By a sense of spiritual civilization , it should be a window of the city and essential building space to daily life of local resident ; it also bears an important responsibility which is heritage city in cultural context .', 'Based on the Yellow River in Lanzhou City , and the study of the new square design concept , analyzed and summarized , presented the concept of square design to create a historical and cultural context of urban culture , the importance of heritage and modern artistic expression should be united with urban history and culture diversity , to make people re-establish the cultural identity for the city to gain ownership in their spirit .', 'Urban environmental management and traffic improvement .', 'As an important part of urban environment , urban traffic environment is one of the key factor that cause urban environment pollution .', "This kind of pollution is comprehensive and involves natural environment , ecological environment , social environment and humanistic landscape , even people 's mentality , etc .", 'So it is a complicated system engineering to solve the urban traffic environmental problem , and traffic environment improvement is crucial for the urban environmental management .', "In this paper , the author illustrates the opinion of considering policy , regulation , management , technology and culture in urban environmental management , meanwhile , we should advocate green traffic , cultivate noble urban traffic culture , make the urban traffic convenient for people 's living and working , so it can maintain the harmonious environment and realize the harmonious development between human and nature .", 'Eco-economic construction and sustainable development of natural scenery city in China .', 'As a country of rich natural resource , China has many beautiful natural scenery resort .', 'Due to rapid growth in tourism , city of various size have been formed with the development of these scenery resort .', 'The rapid growth of these city , while bringing benefit to local people , also produces some serious problem .', 'In this paper , general introduction is given to the study of natural scenery city in China .', 'Type and function of scenery city in China are discussed , and their relation to tourism and urban ecosystem is defined .', 'Special attention is given to the local and nationality factor in the construction of these city .', 'The problem the people are now facing in the construction of the natural scenery city are analyzed and solution presented .']

['The Russian empire 1450-1801 .', 'Being an empire is inseparable from modern Russian identity and historical experience : the Russian empire was founded in the early modern era and endures in large part today .', 'The Russian Empire 1450-1801 survey how Russia ’ s many subject area were conquered and how the empire was governed .', 'It considers the Russian empire a “ Eurasian empire , ” characterized by a “ politics of difference ” : the ruler and their elite at the center defined the state ’ s need minimally ( control over defense , taxation and mobilization of resource , criminal law ) and otherwise tolerated local religion , language , culture , elite , and institution .', 'The center related to community and religion vertically , according each a modicum of right and autonomy but not allowing “ horizontal ” connection across social , ethnic , confessional , or other group potentially with common interest .', 'This book gives detailed attention to the major ethnic and religious group as it surveys strategy of governance-centralized bureaucracy , military reform , judicial system , tolerance of difference .', 'It pays particular attention to the dissemination of a supranational ideology of political legitimacy in a variety of medium , particularly symbolic , such as public ritual , painting , architecture , and urban planning .', 'Beginning with foundational feature , such as geography , climate , demography , and geopolitical situation , the book explores the empire ’ s primarily agrarian economy , serfdom , town and trade , religion , nobility , and high culture .', 'It tracks the emergence of an “ Imperial nobility ” and a national self-consciousness that was , by the end of the eighteenth century , distinctly imperial , embracing the diversity of the empire ’ s many people and culture .', 'Vilnius between nation , 1795-2000 .', 'The inhabitant of Vilnius , the present-day capital of Lithuania , have spoken various language and professed different religion while living together in relative harmony over the year .', 'The city has played a significant role in the history and development of at least three separate cultures-Polish , Lithuanian , and Jewish-and until very recently , no single cultural-linguistic group composed the clear majority of its population .', 'Vilnius between Nations , 1795-2000 is the first study to undertake a balanced assessment of this particularly diverse city .', 'Theodore Weeks examines Vilnius as a physical entity where people lived , worked , and died ; as the object of rhetorical struggle between disparate culture ; and as a space where the state attempted to legitimize a specific version of cultural politics through street name , monument , and urban planning .', 'In investigating these aspect , Weeks avoids promoting any one national narrative of the history of the city , while acknowledging the importance of national culture and their opposing myth of the city ’ s identity .', 'The story of Vilnius as a multicultural city and the negotiation that allowed several national group to inhabit a single urban space can provide lesson that are easily applied to other diverse city .', 'This study will appeal to scholar of Eastern Europe , urban study , and multiculturalism , as well as general reader interested in the region .', 'Demolition on Karl Marx square : Cultural barbarism and the people ’ s state in 1968 .', 'Communist East Germany ’ s demolition of Leipzig ’ s intact medieval University Church in May 1968 was an act widely decried as “ cultural barbarism ” .', 'Although overshadowed by the crackdown on Prague Spring mere week later , the willful destruction of this historic landmark on a central site called Karl Marx Square represents an essential turning point in relation between the Communist authority and the “ people ” they claimed to serve .', 'As the largest case of East German protest between the 1953 Uprising and 1989 Revolution , this intimate local trauma exhibits how the inner working of a “ dictatorial ” system operated more broadly and exposes the often gray and overlapping line between State and citizenry .', 'Through deep analysis of untapped periodical and archive , it introduces a broad cast of character who helped make the demolition possible and restores the voice of ordinary citizen who dared in the name of culture , humanism , and civic pride to protest what they saw as an inconceivable tragedy .', 'In this city that later started the 1989 Revolution triggering the fall of the Berlin Wall , resident from every social background desperately hoped to convince their leader to step back from the brink .', 'But as the dust cleared in 1968 , they saw with all finality that their voice meant nothing , that the DDR was a sham democracy awash with utopian rhetoric that had no connection with their everyday life .', 'If Communism died in Prague in 1968 , it had already died in Leipzig just week before , with repercussion that still haunt today ’ s politics of memory .', 'The Role of the Built Environment in Human Life .', 'Selected Issue .', 'Creation of the built environment and research in this field pose a particularly difficult challenge nowadays .', 'The pace of social and technological change does not allow for evolutionary development of city and the formation of their land use according to current condition .', 'Creating spatial solution that are unmatched in their contexts is becoming not only possible , but very probable ( see Alexander , 1964 ) .', 'The development of the built environment involves not only art , technology , history , economics and law , but also philosophy , culture , medicine , psychology , sociology and many other sphere in which human life is manifested .', 'However , only a relatively small number of discipline such as spatial planning , urban design , urban planning , etc .', '( ignoring at this point the difference in the meaning of the concept ) in their application layer are meant to create space and bear responsibility for it .', 'Also society has certain requirement of practical nature towards them .', 'This article attempts to outline the nature of research on space urbanised by people and to determine the four main field of research aimed at the problem of man and the built environment .', 'In the next part , particular attention is paid to issue related to the impact of the built environment on the life of its resident in order to highlight the particular role and complexity of this area of research .', 'This study , acting as a kind of test of the research , can not be considered representative .', 'Nevertheless , the analysis prompts several reflection on the current and future role of the built environment in the development of our civilisation , as well as further challenge related to it .', 'Everyday milieux and culture of displacement : A comparative investigation into space , place and ( non ) attachment within the German-Polish twin city Guben/Gubin .', "While there is in social science an implicit assumption that by city culture we refer to metropolitan culture , this article attempts to shed a different light on the 'Culture of Cities . '", 'It approaches the issue from within the post-socialist everyday experience of people living in a German-Polish twin city on the outskirt of the larger Berlin-Brandenburg Region .', "The article outlines a longstanding 'culture of displacement ' as dominant for that area , and asks to what extent this rather peripheralized area is equipped to come to term with the option and pressure of globalization and European integration .", 'Drawing on the concept of milieu , the article provides evidence for new dynamic of space , place , and attachment in the context of post-socialist pathway of transformation .', 'It goes on to show the impact this has both on the symbolisms of belonging and on attempt at cross-border urban governance .', 'The article concludes by arguing for a renewed emphasis on the meso- or regional level of analysis in urban study .', 'A Changing Labour Market under the Intensification of Dualization .', 'The Experience of a Southern European Society .', 'Fifty year ago , a Portuguese sociologist , Adérito Sedas Nunes ( 1964 ) , used the image of a ‘ dual society under evolution ’ to refer to Portugal .', 'Since then , the image of Portugal as a country simultaneously old and new , ( post ) modern and traditional was used by several social scientist in various field of research ( migration , urban study , social policy , education , culture ) .', 'In spite of the remarkable process of modernization the country has experienced during this period of time , inequality and dualism continue to be deeply embedded in the economic and social system and were even intensified by recent austerity measure in the context of massive unemployment and economic distress .', 'In the article , I examine two specific domain where sign of dualism ( s ) persist , the labour market and the system of welfare , and investigate how the interconnectedness between the two is generating new form of social and economic inequality .', 'Reform in the labour market have been under constant reform within the last decade , representing , for a large and increasing number of individual , more precarious working condition , low paid job , unstable life with intermittent career .', 'At the same time , governmental policy have contributed to diminish the level of social protection for labour market participant in precarious employment as well as for people without job .', 'This article aims at providing a contribution to the literature on dualization focusing on the link between changing form of integration in the labour market and transformation in the social protection system , examining its specific configuration in one of the country belonging to the Southern European welfare regime .', 'The ignoble savage in urban Yerevan .', 'This article focuses on a recent development in the Armenian capital , Yerevan , described by its urban population as a ruralization process .', 'I explore what it means to call something or someone rural or urban , and I compare the social category of rural people with the social category of the ( old ) urban intelligentsia .', 'This includes an analysis and reconsideration of the traditional nature-culture dichotomy and its meaning for the architecture and urban planning of Yerevan .', 'It also interrogates the classification of people into newcomer from the countryside , urban dweller , new elite , and young men called rabiz .', 'Dilemmas of Identity in Contemporary Cities .', 'the City of Gdansk as an Example .', 'The article is aimed to answer the question how , depending on the historical heritage , the collective memory , the physical space of the city and their image were shaped , through the politics of memory .', "All known culture and language distinguish the 'self ' and the 'other ' , 'us ' and 'them ' .", 'Neither do we know city which wish to differ in some particular way , although they can have numerous identity .', 'Their multitude and diversity may be a source of conflict or contradiction in a creating their coherent image .', 'From a sociological perspective , all identity are constructed .', 'The real problem , however , is how , with what , by whom , and for what ?', 'Although identity are not time-proof , in favourable circumstance , they legitimize and rationalize dominant institution of authority and culture .', 'The public discourse on memory and identity of the modern Gdansk is dominated by multiparadigmatism , going beyond the authenticity of the material and cultural heritage and the state of knowledge presented by historian .', 'Metaphoric and discursive idea , already encoded in the language , such as : Gdansk is a multicultural city ; the city of freedom and the city of solidarity are used to demonstrate the multiparadigmatism .', "Analysis has proved that the identity narration were built mainly on myth-making construction , especially on the myth of 'the Golden Age ' .", "Nowadays , the selection of architectural form , used as a base for the Gdansk 's identity , have been extending with building from the Polish People 's Republic ( 1945-1989 ) period .", 'Their aesthetic and historic value were , until recently , almost completely negated .', 'It was an unwanted heritage .', 'The meaning of centrality and margin in Lisbon ’ s Rossio : Spatializing urban process before and after the 1755 earthquake1 .', 'Praça do Rossio has been the most emblematic space in central Lisbon both before and after the 1755 earthquake that destroyed much of the city .', 'Up until the thirteenth century Rossio was a barren area outside the wall of the medieval city and was used as a common space where people held ceremony for 500 year .', 'The Rossio also connected inland rural area with the city within the wall , acting as a bridge between those two world .', 'For this reason Rossio has always been a space for all kind of vendor , outsider , beggar and social reject , while also a route into the city for agrarian culture , ritual and people .', 'Despite the attempt by the city ’ s master and the Crown to seize the space for the construction of their institution , it was not until the 1755 earthquake that this finally happened .', 'The reconstruction of Lisbon under the gaze of the enlightened rationalist Marquis of Pombal represented the beginning of a new era for the city : giving birth to the modern bourgeois city , in which the historical organization of space was reshaped , the Rossio ’ s traditional function displaced and the meaning and content of the hegemonic city representation and imaginary such as fado music and the annual People ’ s Saints ( Santos Populares ) celebration renewed .', 'In this article , the centrality of Rossio is reviewed , with a stress on the displacement of some of its attribute to the district after the earthquake by the romantic heritage process of meaning .', 'However , the Rossio maintained some of its traditional function , with the daily presence there of African migrant as an example .', 'The role of social and cultural interaction between Russian and Chinese student in changing the educational space of the Russian University .', 'Student as a special social group can be considered as a guide of interaction between the partner country of Russia and China as representative of different culture and different mentality .', 'Interaction between Russian and Chinese university in the scientific and educational sphere has specific feature and reflects the general mechanisms of functioning in social and cultural environment .', 'The socio-cultural context of such interaction is the life activity of megalopolis , regional feature and it is related to the socio-cultural tradition of people relationship .', 'The general purpose of the study was to identify change in interaction between Russian and Chinese student studying in a Russian University .', 'The study conducted in Russian and Chinese University .', 'The research methodology combined both qualitative and quantitative approach .', 'The primary data was collected using questionnaire and in-depth interview .', 'Three hundred and ninety respondent - Russian student and five hundred respondent - Chinese student , were questioned on the basis of quota sampling .', 'Depth interview were conducted with 20 expert .', 'The study has revealed some actual issue and tendency of social interaction in the educational sphere .', 'It has a temporal character and it is developed in a single educational environment of universities-partners of Russia and China .', 'The study has identified the structure of social interaction , consisting of five level : 1 .', 'At the level of connectivity , social relation between social and ethnic group ( in this case , Russian and Chinese student ) are established on the basis of their value .', '2 .', 'At the level of translation , understanding of the value of another ( different ) culture through the interpretation of cultural code ( cultural sign ) takes place .', '3 .', "At the level of transcendence , transition from one 's cultural system to another , the development of positive experience and knowledge of another cultural system take place .", '4 .', 'At the level of adaptation , an interiorization , application in behaviour and activity of value of other cultural system take place .', '5 .', 'At the level of inter cultural dialogue , an organization of effective and fruitful cooperation between social and ethnic group and their representative based on an understanding of the universal value takes place .', 'The five level of social interaction identified by research in the joint educational environment of Russian and Chinese university allow not only to find out the content component of the structure of social and cultural interaction , but also to consider its dynamic and development .', 'Our research has identified a set of factor that affect the functioning of the interaction between Russian and Chinese student structure : geopolitical situation , cost and quality of education , adaptation of training course for foreigner , comfort of the educational environment of University , the complexity of learning of the host country language , the prestige of education .', 'This model of interaction between social and ethnic group of Russian and Chinese student being representative of partner university is confirmed by the real practice of scientific and educational cooperation between Russian and Chinese university .', 'Joint form of University work have been successfully tested and activity that have become event of inter cultural dialogue have been organized .', 'Myth and Reality of Adaptable city .', 'Contemporary City as Adaptable Hybrid .', 'Global space - both natural and cultural - is the greatest good belonging to the human community .', 'The said community has , therefore , the right and responsibility to protect it , wisely and in solidarity , from wasteful exploitation .', 'The postulate of public utility of this good must also presume such mutual conditioning of the right and obligation of private owner that would minimise the chance of their infringement of collective interest .', 'The culture of space management became an important measure of cultural level of society at the turn of the 20th century , perhaps one of those moment which decide upon the future of our civilisation .', "The conclusion that large agglomeration in particular are `` incorrigible zone of spatial and social pathology , from which we need to escape into pristine area and there create a more perfect living environment '' is unacceptable , also from the ethical point of view , both as regard the people living in those agglomeration and nature .", 'As far as what has been created by man is concerned , we need to assume that we are able to control and improve this material creation of our civilisation .', "Such is the fundamental requirement of sustainable development - a difficult , but probably the only way of managing `` the global village '' in the millennium that has just commenced .", "The spatial structure of the contemporary city as a whole is a broken form : it has formally expressive and perfectly composed element , it has mutilated composition , chaotic arrangement and `` lost space '' , finally , it has space that as yet have not been properly used compositionally and are still waiting for their role in the whole .", 'A broken form - in compliance with the principle of irreversibility - may not return to its original composition .', 'Thinking about the future of the city and taking into account the irrefutable fact that a considerable part of the built environment of tomorrow already exists today , we should ask ourselves the question : can it adopt , as a whole , a composition of a different kind ?', 'If the urbanised environment , being the basic one , is also to become a full-value environment for human existence , it will require continuous and universal improvement of its quality , as well as new strategy , method and scenario for rational organisation of urbanised space that will be able to meet new challenge .', "It seems that `` dramaturgically consistent logic of composition '' may become an original formula of urban public space .", "Scenario built on the basis of the city `` genotype '' , in which urban `` layer of memory '' are the basis for adaptive transformation .", 'Overview of relevant regional culture study ( the Krasnoyarsk krai ) : Challenge and approach .', 'This article presents the result of the analysis of relevant regional culture study .', 'The purpose of this analysis was to determine which area of cultural research in the modern world are the war ” and “ peace ” .', 'Problem of preservation of ethnocultural and urban-planning heritage of the European north of Russia .', 'The relevance of the problem is caused by the need to preserve the monument of the ethnocultural and urban heritage of the European North of Russia , which are an integral part of the cultural heritage of the people of the world .', 'The purpose of the article is to theoretically substantiate the importance of preserving historical memory as one of the key priority of urban planning and public policy .', 'The leading approach to the study of this problem is the analysis of cultural heritage object , based on linguistic data , lexicographic evidence ( toponyms ) , ethnocultural community ( voloki ) , and also on the basis of archaeological excavation , the stage of the formation of East Slavic unity and the settlement of Novgorod Slavs are considered .', 'On the basis examined material shown that the space of settlement of ethnic community in specific landscape is fixed by historical monument , which on a time scale became sign of the culture of urban development .', 'The material of the article can be useful for city planner , architect , cultural figure and scientist , as well as to student studying in the direction of « urban planning » , « reconstruction and restoration » .', 'The house for music - Concept and place .', 'Modern tendency , author ’ s own experience .', 'The subject of this dissertation are building intended for music and their role in urban space .', 'House for music – that is how we can briefly name building whose basic function is listening to music in the form of a concert - Philharmonic building .', 'Also in the form of a show or performance fused with music .', 'The third function of such building is to ensure the possibility for people to meet , adding certain nobility to the event in question , and therefore , added nobility to the venue itself .', 'This last function is gaining significance .', 'It is accompanied by the phenomenon of identifying the event as the function itself and simultaneously identifying the site .', 'The growing value of such place stems from the oldest concept of urban referring to the ’ city for people ’ .', 'He reminds us that the number and the quality of the place are of utmost importance – place which create the occasion to participate in the urban membrane .', 'The need for meeting builds the identity of a place , connecting cultural idea with concept which create culture and put architecture and music in the centre .', 'The sound of the music itself becomes an element of the identity , the sound – however invisible , is very important for the place – on equal right with the architecture of the designed building .', 'The sound facilitated in the musing show us that architecture and music are linked inter-disciplinarily as an important or perhaps even basic material for these building .', 'The increasing significance of the relation between foun-dations of behavior and its law-oriented norm .', 'The same characteristic remain dominant in the transition to an urban environment .', 'Introduction .', 'The Warsaw Housing Cooperative ( â€˜Å » of various entities/subjects , an example of creating a common based on biopolitical production of custom , norm , taste , principle of cooperation and , finally , subjectivity .', 'A common good produced and distributed contrary to the logic of capital in a modern city , at a time it was desperately lacking its resource .', 'The cooperativeâ€™s ambition was to show people how to live and to turn ( passive ) resident into ( active ) citizen .', 'Soon , the cooperativeâ€™s founder have transpired to beâ€ ” as we would now sayâ€ ” activist , or critical spatial practitioner ( Markus Miessen ) , and the development became a laboratory for modernist urban planning practice .', 'What began as an estate for working-class resident , thanks to the involvement of intellectual keen on the concept of â€˜sociology in actionâ€™ , saw the introduction of numerous experimental form of urban communal living .', 'An analysis of this historical case relates to question often posed today by and aesthetic image is carried out , are researched .', 'Result are summarized and conclusion are made .', 'Study on reconstruction of the Holy Cross wooden church in Wodzisław Śląski .', 'Wooden church used to commonly appear in Silesia through the past century .', "Their location was the result of local people 's need and the accessibility of material necessary to construct them .", 'The form and the nature of those church were the fruit of intermingling influence of various national culture of the inhabitant of those area , craftsmanship experience of various structure builder and depended on the extent of wealth of the city , town and village they were erected in .', 'Wodzisław Śląski was among the place with wooden sacred object , in the 19th century , it was a small town direct vicinity .', "In the period of heavy rainfall , the rapid stream used to wash out the hill , thus , affecting the church foundation , directly contributing to deterioration of the structure 's technical condition .", 'The critically bad condition of the church structure was the main reason for the decision to pull it down after 1826 .', "Throughout the recent year , the growth of the local Wodzisław Śląski .', 'Identity construction of the European medium sized city through the monasticism repercussion in Écija .', "The monasticism appeared during the dawn of Christianity has made a the Territory of Present-day Slovakia ( 1918 - 1938 ) .', 'The end of the Great war brought about many change in the European political , social and economic climate .', 'Monarchy were replaced with more democratic system , country lost their territory , and new sates based on national principle were established .', 'In 1918 , after a period of ethnic oppression and magyarization in the Hungarian part of the Habsburg Empire following the Austro-Hungarian Compromise , the Bohemian and Slovak people declared their independence and founded a new national state - the Czechoslovakia .', 'The period short after its foundation was one full of enthusiasm and joy stemming from the newfound freedom and opportunity for cultivation of national culture , identity and politics in democratic environment on the one hand , and challenge brought by the dissolution of the Austro-Hungarian economy and political system on the other .', 'As a result of establishing the new state , the need arose to define its nation by architecture and the issue of National Style reemerged .', 'After the brief period of Rondocubism preference , for some time , the official building retained certain expressive character and massive feature .', 'Even after giving way to Modernism , the sense of traditionalism was evident .', 'In the Slovak part of Czechoslovakia , bank building , as building of institution that once supported national-emancipatory aspiration of Slovak people , bank architecture often used well-established scheme and preferred more traditional design to convey desired message .', 'The institution in charge of monetary separation and management of the new currency was the Banking Office of the Ministry of Finance and subsequently the National Bank of Czechoslovakia ( since 1926 ) .', 'After the collapse of Austro-Hungarian Empire , all the building of branch office of the former central bank - the Austro-Hungarian Bank - were took over by the Czechoslovak government .', 'These were often extended , as were the case of branch office building in Bratislava , Košice and Žilina .', 'When they no longer fitted the formal or capacity criterion , three new branch office building were built on the territory of present-day Slovakia : a neo-renaissance building in Banská Bystrica ( Ladislav Skřivánek , 1930 - 1932 ) and two building in the style of regional modernism with note of traditionalism and classical feature in Ružomberok ( Vladimír Fischer , 1930 - 1932 ) and Bratislava ( Emil Belluš , 1936-1938 ) .', 'The article examines stylistic , ideological , formal , and layout requirement for an architectural concept of a central bank institution demonstrated on the example of branch office building built during existence of the First Czechoslovak Republic in the territory of the present-day Slovakia .', 'As a part of a systematic research focused on Slovak bank building , the chosen building will be analysed , compared with relevant example , and interpreted in the context of political , social , and economical situation , and style and typological particularity .', 'Social Cohesion and Urban Sprawl : Urbanization in the Perspective of Social Concern .', 'From
